title: Chloe Moretz Is Just As Obsessed With Adele's Single As We Are
text: Chloe Moretz holds an adorable puppy in her arms while out in New York City on Thursday afternoon (October 22). The 18-year-old actress joined her older brother, Trevor, for a little shopping after catching a New York Rangers game earlier in the week. PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Chloe Moretz It looks like [...] Â»
